family.name: Yealink/Dreamwave T2X Models: [T20, T22, T26, T28]
family.description: Make more configuration settings available from UI
family.changelog: PACKAGER: Several updates have been made to both the T2X and T3X families, including:- + Support for DialNow + Ability to specify how often the phone will check for configuration updates in the user interface (T2X only) + Ability to set the phone's user interface password from the user interface + Ability to set the phone's dial tone country in the user interface + Ability to set full firmware URL, rather than have TFTP forced on you (T3X only) - Remove specific settings for handset/headset/speakerphone volume settings so user preferences don't get overridden every time the phone re-provisions ! Fix phone.php to allow all six lines to be configured on a T38 or T28. ! Fix a couple of typos in the default $mac.cfg for T3X series

family.name: Yealink/Dreamwave T3X Models: [T32, T38]
family.description: Make more settings available in user interface
